meanings.definition: The act of bringing together again after being separated.
meanings.sent1: The reunifications of long-lost siblings brought tears of joy to their family.
meanings.sent2: The reunifications of the scattered family members were heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: The reunifications of the missing puzzle pieces made completing the puzzle a breeze.
meanings.sent4: The reunifications of the broken shards formed a beautiful mosaic of memories.
meanings.sent5: The reunifications of the scattered leaves created a colorful carpet on the ground.

meanings.definition: The process of reuniting or joining together again.
meanings.sent1: The reunifications of old friends at the school reunion were filled with laughter.
meanings.sent2: The reunifications of the divided community brought a sense of unity.
meanings.sent3: The reunifications of the mismatched socks seemed like a miracle in the laundry.
meanings.sent4: The reunifications of the musical notes created a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent5: The reunifications of the scattered books on the shelf made the library look organized.
